thread.title: Happy Customer
thread.title_full: Bundle Stars reviewed by Happy Customer

author: Happy Customer
title: Happy Customer
text:
Have been using them for 5 years, I'm typically very picky and frugal with it, over the years there have been some excellent bundles in both pricing and selections. When I have needed their support (due to payment problems on my side) they helped me very quickly to put my mind at ease and resolve the issue.
Their pricing on the Lego games and WB games in generally is consistently great.
